攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，在找不到攻击目标时可以将攻击能量<@ba.en: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>; When unable to find a target, attacks can be <@ba.kw>stored up</> and fired all at once (Up to 3 charges)

攻击范围内的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>，对自己前方一横排的敌人攻击力提升至1.en: Attacks <@ba.kw>all enemies</> within range, and deals 150% damage to enemies in the row directly in front of this unit.

优先攻击攻击范围内<@ba.kw>防御力最低</>的敌方单位.en: Prioritizes attacking the enemy with <@ba.kw>lowest DEF</> within range first

击杀敌人后获得1点部署费用，撤退时返还初始部署费用.en: Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated

技能发动期间阻挡数变为0.en: Cannot block enemies during the skill duration

可以在攻击范围内选择一次<@ba.kw>战术点</>来召唤援军，自身攻击援军阻挡.en: This unit can designate one <@ba.kw>Tactical Point</> within attack range to call Reinforcements; ATK is increased to 150% when attacking enemies blocked by Reinforcements

可以攻击到<@ba.kw>较远敌人</>，攻击自身未阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至12.en: Can attack enemies <@ba.kw>from range</>; When attacking enemies not blocked by self, increase ATK to 120%

可以进行<@ba.kw>远程攻击</>，但此时攻击力降低至80%.en: Can launch <@ba.kw>Ranged Attacks</> that deal 80% of normal ATK

不成为其他角色的治疗目标，每次攻击到敌人后回复自身<@ba.kw>{value}.en: Can't be healed by other units. Recovers <@ba.kw>{value}</> self HP every time this operator attacks an enemy

再部署时间<@ba.kw>减少</>，撤退时不返还<@ba.kw>部署费用</>.en: Has <@ba.kw>reduced</> Redeployment Time, but <@ba.kw>DP Cost</> is not refunded upon retreating; While deployed, <@ba.kw>3 DP</> are consumed every 3 seconds (automatically retreats without sufficient DP)

技能可以使敌人产生<@ba.kw>位移</>\\n可以放置于远程位.en:
Can <@ba.kw>Shift</> enemies by using skills
Can be deployed on Ranged Tiles

同时恢复三个友方单位的生命.en: Restores the HP of 3 allies simultaneously

拥有较大治疗范围，但在治疗较远目标时治疗量变为<@ba.kw>{heal_sca.en: Has a large healing range, but the healing amount on farther targets is reduced to <@ba.kw>{heal_scale:0%}</>

技能可以治疗友方单位.en: Can heal allies by using skill(s)

技能开启时普通攻击会造成法术伤害.en: Normal attacks deal Arts damage while the skill is active

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n可以使用<@ba.kw>召唤物</>.en:
Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>
Can use <@ba.kw>Summons</> in battles

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，并对敌人造成短暂的<$ba.sluggi.en: Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</> and <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> the target for a short time

能够阻挡两个敌人，使用<支援装置>协助作战.en: Blocks 2 enemies; Can use <Support Devices> in battles

对攻击范围内<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>造成伤害\\n拥有50%的物理和法术闪.en:
Deals Damage to <@ba.kw>all targets</> within range
50% chance to dodge Physical and Arts attacks and is less likely to be <@ba.kw>targeted</> by enemies

同时攻击阻挡的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>\\n可以放置于远程位.en:
Can attack <@ba.kw>all blocked enemies</>
Can be deployed on Ranged Tiles

受到致命伤时不撤退，切换成<替身>作战（替身阻挡数为0），持续20秒后自身再次替.en: Does not retreat upon receiving lethal damage, instead swaps to a <Substitute> (Substitute has 0 Block). Swaps back to the original after 20 seconds

再部署时间<@ba.kw>减少</>，可使用远程攻击.en: Has <@ba.kw>reduced</> Redeployment Time, can use ranged attacks

无法被友方角色治疗，攻击造成<@ba.kw>群体伤害</>，每攻击到一个敌人回复.en: Cannot be healed by allies; Attacks deal <@ba.kw>AOE Damage</>; Recovers <@ba.kw>50</> HP for every enemy hit during attacks, up to Block count

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，且会在<@ba.kw>3</>个敌人间跳.en: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and jump between <@ba.kw>3</> enemies. Each jump deals 15% less damage and inflicts a brief <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>

通常时<@ba.kw>不攻击</>且防御力和法术抗性大幅度<@ba.kw>提升<.en: Normally <@ba.kw>does not attack</>, but has <@ba.kw>greatly increased</> DEF and RES; When skill is active, attacks deal <@ba.kw>AoE Arts damage</>

攻击造成<@ba.kw>超远距离的群体法术伤害</>.en: Deals <@ba.kw>AOE Arts damage in a long line</>

操作<@ba.kw>浮游单元</>对敌人造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n.en: Controls a <@ba.kw>Drone</> to deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage to an enemy; When the Drone continuously attacks the same enemy, its damage will increase (up to 110% of the operator's ATK)

恢复友方单位生命，并回复相当于攻击力50%的<@ba.dt.element>元素.en: Restores the HP of allied units and recovers <@ba.dt.element>Elemental Damage</> by 50% of ATK (can recover <@ba.dt.element>Elemental Damage</> of unhurt allied units)

攻击造成法术伤害，攻击敌人时为攻击范围内一名友方干员治疗相当于50%伤害的生命值.en: Attacks deal Arts damage and heal the HP of an ally within Attack Range for 50% of the damage dealt

不阻挡敌人时优先<@ba.kw>远程群体</>物理攻击.en: When not blocking enemies, prioritizes dealing <@ba.kw>ranged AoE</> Physical damage

只有阻挡敌人时才能够回复技力.en: Only restores SP when blocking enemies

攻击对小范围的<@ba.kw>地面</>敌人造成<@ba.kw>两次</>物理伤.en: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>two instances</> of Physical damage to <@ba.kw>ground</> enemies in a small area (The second instance is a shockwave that has half the normal ATK)

不攻击，持续恢复范围内所有友军<@ba.kw>生命</>（每秒恢复相当于自身攻击.en: Does not attack but continuously restores the <@ba.kw>HP</> of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to 10% of self ATK). Self is unaffected by <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</>

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，技能开启后改为治疗友方单位（治疗量相当于.en: Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>; When skill is active, attacks instead restore the HP of allies (heal amount is equal to 75% of ATK)

可以使用陷阱来协助作战，但陷阱无法放置于<@ba.kw>敌人已在</>的格子中.en: Can use traps to assist in combat, but traps cannot be placed <@ba.kw>on tiles already occupied by an enemy</>

通常不攻击且阻挡数为0，技能未开启时<@ba.kw>{max_stack_cnt.en: Normally does not attack and has 0 Block; When skill is inactive, ATK gradually increases up to <@ba.kw>+{atk:0%}</> over <@ba.kw>{max_stack_cnt}</> seconds. ATK is reset when the skill ends

不攻击，持续恢复范围内所有友军<@ba.kw>生命</>（每秒恢复相当于自身攻击.Name: Sora
不攻击，持续恢复范围内所有友军<@ba.kw>生命</>（每秒恢复相当于自身攻击.en: Does not attack but continuously restores the <@ba.kw>HP</> of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to 10% of self ATK). Self is unaffected by <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</>
